title: ISSEY MIYAKE font?
content:
Hi,

can anyone identify this ISSEY MIYAKE typeface? Appreciate for your help, thank you.
author: evelinat

comments.content:
post an image or link to an image of the typeface

———————————————————-  
 [Read Between the Leading podcast](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430134603/http:/rbtl.us/) | [Pixelspread](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430134603/http:/pixelspread.com/)

here is an image. I think the typeface looks like Times New Roman. Or I'm wrong.. Thanks a million.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430134603im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Issey_Miyake_3718.jpg)

It's certainly not "Times New Roman" but looks along the lines of [Bodoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430134603/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/bodoni/fonts/). Of course this face is more extended and the "K" is slightly off. Why isn't my brain working this morning? more... coffee.
It’s a major fashion brand, so I’d assume it’s a custom design.
THANK YOU SO MUCH GUYS!!!! YOU ARE SO SMART!

_It’s a major fashion brand, so I’d assume it’s a custom design._

that's true, almost any major brand is going to customize their wordmark

just look up didone or modern serif typefaces, you'll find something similar

———————————————————-  
 [Read Between the Leading podcast](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430134603/http:/rbtl.us/) | [Pixelspread](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430134603/http:/pixelspread.com/)
